name: Despicable Me inspired minion beanie
description: This cute little guy is not only a joy to make but a hit with young boys and girls alike and absolutely adorable on babies! This design is also customizable because it can be made with one eye or no earflaps, the eyes can be 3d (as shown) or they can be flat, you can even add a cute little bow in the color of your choice for girls!

name: La La Loopsy inspired beanie with earflaps
description: This La La Loopsy Inspired beanie is sure to be a hit with any young girl. Handmade to fit a child between the ages of 4 and 7, she features 16 purple curly cues styled to look like two full ponytails with pink tulle bows. What's very unique about her is that she's been crocheted with brown yarn to resemble an African American but would make a stylish addition to any little girls wardrobe! However, I am taking special orders so she is completely customizable.
